About

Heyo, I’m Aaron, a product designer in San Francisco. I design with usability and simplicity in mind. I’m most interested in solving complex problems with unique solutions and building meaningful products that have a real impact on people’s lives. Currently I’m at Gumroad helping creators earn a living doing that they love, join us.

Previously I lead design at Fantex, a finance startup that lets you invest in a professional athletes brand. Prior to that I spent time at other ventures in healthcare, tech, education, and a ton of time freelancing. You should say hi!
